whoWeAreDesc: RJ Code IT is a team of specialists creating modern websites, web applications, mobile apps, and PWA systems tailored to individual business needs.
trustedPartner: Comprehensive Technology Support for Your Business
trustedPartnerDesc: We specialize in creating high-quality digital solutions that drive your company's growth. We combine technical knowledge with a business approach, delivering products that not only look great but primarily achieve your company's strategic goals.

experiencedTeam.title: Experienced Team
experiencedTeam.desc: A team of experts with years of experience in developing advanced web and mobile applications.

modernTools.title: Latest Technologies
modernTools.desc: We work with React, React Native, Next.js, and other modern frameworks, providing efficient and future-proof solutions.

customerCentric.title: Results-Oriented
customerCentric.desc: We focus on delivering solutions that bring real business benefits and measurable results.

endToEnd.title: Comprehensive Service
endToEnd.desc: From needs analysis, through UX/UI design, programming, to deployment and technical support.

toolsAndTechDesc: We use proven and modern technologies that guarantee the efficiency, security, and scalability of your project:

react.name: React
react.description: A library for creating dynamic user interfaces

reactNative.name: React Native
reactNative.description: Framework for building native mobile applications

nextjs.name: Next.js
nextjs.description: React framework for efficient web applications

nodejs.name: Node.js
nodejs.description: JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine

express.name: Express
express.description: Fast, unopinionated web framework for Node.js

callToAction: Need a professional technology partner? Contact us and transform your ideas into working solutions!

AboutContainer.title: About Us
AboutContainer.description: Learn more about our team and what drives us to deliver exceptional web solutions.

techItems.title: Our Tech Stack
techItems.description: We're passionate about leveraging the latest technologies to craft innovative solutions.
